title: Base64 converter
description: Encode and decode data to Base64, used for transferring binary data in text-based environments like email or URLs.
howItWorks: The input text is converted to an array of bytes.
Browser built-in btoa/atob are used with an extra Unicode-safe layer for proper handling of non-ASCII characters.
privacyNote: No text is stored or sent anywhere. All conversions happen entirely in your browser’s memory.

title: JSON formatter & validator
description: A tool to prettify, minify and fix messy JSON snippets.
features: Syntax error detection with line number
Colorful theme for better code readability
howItWorks: Uses JSON.parse for validation and JSON.stringify for reformatting.

title: Code visualizer
description: Turn complex code into visual graphs and flowcharts to understand logic and structure faster.
features: Graph of relations between functions and classes
Automatic detection of nodes and edges

technicalNote.title: Processing pipeline
technicalNote.content: The tool parses your code (without executing it) and converts its structure into a graph. For JS it uses an AST parser, and for C# it uses advanced regular expressions to extract methods.

howItWorks: The input code is analyzed by the appropriate parser (JS or C#).
Functions, classes and variables are identified as nodes.
Calls and dependencies are drawn as edges.
React Flow renders the final graph interactively.

title: Live Markdown preview
description: A Markdown editor with live HTML preview, perfect for writing docs and READMEs.
features: Support for tables and code blocks

title: Charts from Excel
description: Convert data from Excel files into interactive, beautiful charts (bar, pie, line and area).
howItWorks: The file is parsed with the XLSX library and the data is converted to JSON for use with chart libraries like Recharts.

title: Online Excel editor
description: Open and edit XLSX and CSV files without Office, with search and filtering.
privacyNote: Your Excel file is processed in the browser and the edited version is generated directly on your device.

title: Smart image compressor
description: Reduce PNG and JPEG file size by up to 90% with minimal visible quality loss for web use.
howItWorks: The image is drawn onto a hidden canvas and re-encoded using the browser’s image compression algorithms.

title: Color picker from image
description: Upload an image and pick HEX/RGB codes for any pixel, plus generate a color palette.
features: Generation of the dominant color palette

technicalNote.title: Canvas API
technicalNote.content: The tool uses getImageData to access the raw pixel array of the image.

title: Merge PDF files
description: Join multiple PDF files into a single document in your preferred order.
features: No limit on number of files

technicalNote.title: pdf-lib library
technicalNote.content: Merging works by manipulating the internal PDF structure, without re‑rendering pages.

title: Word to PDF
description: Convert .docx files to PDF while keeping fonts and styles as intact as possible in the browser.
privacyNote: Unlike many services, your Word file is never uploaded; the conversion runs entirely in the browser.

title: Secure password generator
description: Generate strong, hard‑to‑guess passwords using system entropy sources.

technicalNote.title: CSPRNG
technicalNote.content: Uses crypto.getRandomValues, which relies on hardware noise sources to generate cryptographically secure random numbers.

title: Hash generator
description: Create digital fingerprints (hashes) for text and files using standard algorithms.
features: Support for SHA‑256, SHA‑512 and MD5

title: IP & location checker
description: Show your public IP, ISP name and approximate server location.

technicalNote.title: External APIs
technicalNote.content: Uses multiple trusted IP information APIs (such as ipapi) in parallel.

title: User‑Agent analyzer
description: Extract browser, OS and device information from the User‑Agent string.

title: QR code generator
description: Create QR codes for links, text, email or Wi‑Fi with customization options.

title: Unit converter
description: Convert a wide range of units (length, weight, temperature, volume, speed and more).
features: Support for metric and imperial units

title: Date converter
description: Convert between Jalali (Shamsi), Gregorian and Hijri dates.

title: Word counter
description: Count words, characters, sentences and paragraphs in your text.

title: Audio editor (beta)
description: Quickly trim and prepare audio files entirely in the browser, with no software installation or file upload.
features: Trim any custom range of audio
Preview playback of the selected range
Apply fade‑in / fade‑out at the start and end of the clip
howItWorks: The audio file is decoded into an AudioBuffer using the Web Audio API, and the selected range is cut out based on start and end times.
Fade‑in and fade‑out effects are applied directly to the raw audio data, and the final output is encoded as WAV in the browser.
privacyNote: All audio processing is done locally with the Web Audio API, and no files are uploaded or stored on any server.
